de.tum.in.osgi.utility

Class ServiceTracker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.osgi.utility.ServiceTracker<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Service Type to track
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiServiceTracker, SingleServiceTracker

    public abstract class ServiceTracker<T>
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener

    Title: ServiceTracker

    Description: Tracks active services of a certain type

    Author:
    AMIT KUMAR MONDAL
